This folder contains 3rd party libraries needed for SlitScanGenerator.

Currently these are:
  - FFMPEG: https://www.ffmpeg.org/ (binaries/dev archives checked in)
  - CImg: https://github.com/dtschump/CImg (cloned as GIT submodule)
  - 7zip: https://www.7-zip.org/ (used for the install_3rdparty.bat install script)
